title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 366 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
June 6, 2017
On Tuesday, June 6, 2017, the President signed into law:H.R. 366, the “DHS Stop Asset and Vehicle Excess Act or the DHS SAVE Act,” which requires the Under Secretary for Management of the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to oversee and manage vehicle fleets throughout DHS; and imposes new requirements on DHS components regarding the management of those fleets.
